transcript:
Customer: Hello, Monday Tuesday bhai baithege abhi to abhi aa rahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Hello, Monday Tuesday bhai baithege. Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji bataiye. Ji bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir, shadaab bol rahe the ji aapke account me mujhe.
Customer: Batao shadaab bhai kya haal hai?
Executive: Badhiya hai sir, aap bhi bataye sir.
Customer: Thik hu. Batao.
Executive: Ha sir, mai ye bol raha tha ki refund ki baat kar rahe hai na aap?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To wo abhi aapke beech discussion hua hoga. Senior medical ke sath me.
Customer: Ha to usse kya solution kya nikla tha usse?
Executive: Solution kya nikla tha?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: 10-10 din ka time manga hai unhone. Seven days ka.
Customer: Hmm. Accha matlab ki. Ji ji ji.
Executive: Seven days me wo wo mujhe denge product sale koi.
Customer: Hmm. Accha matlab ki unhone bola ki.
Executive: Baaki maine saari cheeze. Baaki maine saari cheeze saari sab kuch unko samjha diya hai, bata diya hai, dikha diya hai.
Customer: Ji ji. Maine unko bol diya tha maine kaha. Aise aise promises hue the.
Executive: Ji ji. Aise aise promises hue the, aisa aisa mere sath hua.
Customer: Bhai, thik hai jo bhi jo bhi hua maine saari cheeze unko explain kar di. 15-20 minute ki baat bhi hui thi meri unse. Aisa nahi hai paanch se chhe minute ki baat hui thi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Maine apni bhi cheeze boli, maine unki maine unko cheeze boli, unhone kaha ki aap saat-aath din dekh lo. Ji. Agar samajh me aa raha ho to nahi to fir video call repeat karke aapka jo refund hai wo initiate kar denge. Maine kaha thik hai. Agar aapko nahi samajh me aata to lekin aap jab abhi ye jo saat-aath din hai aap usme mindset is wale se dekho ki vyapar badhe, vyapar kam na ho.
Customer: Ha nahi unka bhi kehna sahi tha ki matlab ki dekho wo to refund ke liye agree kar hi gaye ki refund hum karwa denge. Ha to. Nahi sir, agreement me to koi dikkat nahi hai. Agree to ho hi ja rahe hai.
Executive: Ha matlab maine unse seedha baat hi kar diya tha. Maine kaha dekhiye unko jo matlab bola gaya tha ki jo aapke paas leads aayegi wo verified leads aayengi. Ha aur aapko jo payment hoga wo cash on delivery nahi hoga, pehle prepaid hoga. Waise zyada tar log prepaid hi karte hai lekin thoda sa convince karna padta hai unko.
Customer: Are to bhai convince mai mai ek baar karunga, do baar karunga, chaatunga thodi yaar.
Executive: Ha nahi wo cheez to hai. Ha to maine bhai abhi ek baar bola, do baar bola, teen baar bola usko entertain bhi kara. Ki mai ab aap ye ye kaho ki bilkul hi usko haath jodo uske to haath to bhai mai apne aaji ke nahi jodu. Ye thodi hai na.
Customer: Nahi sahi hai aap. Sahi hai. Matlab ki bhai dekho agar dekhiye aap hai bade businessman. Mai bata du seedhi baat. Aapka business jo hai bada hai. To bada business me jo. Ha. Bataiye. Ji. Bataiye aap bataiye.
Executive: Mai bol raha hu ki ji aapka business jo hai na wo hai bada. Koi chhota businessman hota hai na apna business badhane ke liye wo aise chhechhta hai. Hmm. Ha.
Executive: Jiska bada business hota hai na wo jhukta nahi kabhi bhi. Seedha face to face matlab direct baat karta hai. Isiliye dekho badi badi jiski deal hoti hai na wo deal matlab bade bade logo se hi karta hai. Yaha pe chhote log bhi aayenge, bade log bhi aayenge. Ab zahir si baat hai hum jab connect karte hai buyer se to usme chhoti lead bhi hoti hai, badi lead bhi hoti hai. Par sabka. Nahi mujhe alag alag lead nahi chahiye bhai. Wo hafte me mere ko 17 lead nahi chahiye. Mere ko ek lead chahiye dhanki chahiye.
Customer: Yehi baat maine unse kahi, yehi baat mai aapse keh raha hu.
Executive: Nahi dekho lead ka jo hai lead to dekho jo IndiaMART allow karti hai 17 lead wo to aapko 17 ki 17 lead aapko aayengi hi aayengi. Ab 17 lead me matlab hum usko use kar rahe hai ki wo lapse ho rahe hai. Wo cheeze to aap pe depend karta hai ki usko hum use karna hai ki lapse karna hai. Ya to badi lead pe hi connect karna hai ki chhoti lead pe connect karna hai. Ha bas ye hai ki jo aapse inhone bola hai na aapne aap inhone bola ki matlab ki wo saat-aath din thoda sa use kariyega. Matlab mind mindset aap ye mat rakhiyega ki ha mujhe to refund hi chahiyega. Refund to at last aapko to unhone promise kar liya hai ki ho jayega to matlab ho hi jayega. Bas ye hai ki mindset ye rakhiye ki ha business karna hai. Agar aapke paas agar kuch behtar ho agar aapka koi employee wagera ho agar wo baat kare to aur behtar rahega.
Customer: Sir employees mai har cheez ke liye alag employee rakhta hu. Apna ₹35,000 dene ke baad ₹15,000 ka employee aur aur nahi rakhta hu mai ye baat. Yehi baat maine unse matlab diya hua hai baat karne ke liye. Mujhe batane ke liye ki bhaiya ye lead aa rahi hai, ye lead nahi aa rahi hai. Aur meri unse ye bhi baat hui thi ki aap mujhe har ek chhoti lead ki har ek cheez ki aap mujhe information doge. Customer se baat nahi ho payegi wo baat mai manta hu lekin aapko lead to dikhti hai na aapke system pe.
Executive: Hamare paas bhi lead aati hai.
Customer: Aapko lead dikhti to hogi aap bhale customer se baat baat nahi kar paoge. Lekin mujhe to lead dikh rahi hai na aapko. Ha aapke liye agar mai aapki profile open karunga to lead dikhti hai.
Executive: Hai na? To ye sab cheeze usko management karna, unko batana, cheeze karna wo sab aapka kaam hai sir.
Customer: Sir hum ye guide kar sakte hai ki kaise connect use karte hai. Kaha se bada order ka filter laga sakte hai. Ab sir mere paas 120 companies aap hi sochiye. 120 companies me agar mai daily connect bhi karna hota hai mujhe senior se to mai sir agar profile open karunga to aath ghante ki shift hoti hai. Daily bheed me pura aath ghanta nikal jayega aap khud hi samajh sakte hai.
Executive: Ji sir, aapne kis cheez ke liye mere ko phone kara hai wo aap bataiye.
Customer: Ha sir, yahi matlab ki yahi discussion ke regarding maine call kiya tha. Bas matlab ye tha ki matlab saat din jo aap use karega thoda sa waise use kariyega. Baaki mai aapko saat din baad hi connect karunga. Koi dikkat nahi. Thik hai. Thik hai. Thank you. Thik hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants verified leads, not just any leads.

- Wants refund if leads are not satisfactory.

- Wants information on every lead.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use connect feature.

- Executive assured refund if not satisfied after 7 days.

- Executive said customer should focus on business growth.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after 7 days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, refund, subscription, business growth
